content.raw:
if those PR's were included in 8.0, I would agree, but since they will be in the next 8.x release and weren't in 8.0.0, I thought it would be useful to indicate in the changelog

if our changelog was ordered chronologically, perhaps we could skip duplicating them, but with the current ordering, it's hard to tell when things were merged forward
